sections.title: Reworked UI
changes: Complete overhaul of the user interface: Enjoy a fresh, modern, and intuitive design that enhances user experience and navigation.
Responsive design: Improved compatibility across various devices and screen sizes.
Enhanced visual elements: New icons, animations, and color schemes for a more engaging look.

sections.title: Improved Comparing Servers
changes: Detailed metrics: Added more server metrics for a comprehensive comparison.
User-friendly layout: Redesigned layout to make comparing servers more intuitive and visually appealing.
Fixed UI glitches: Addressed visual and functional glitches in the comparison interface.

sections.title: Improved Server Page
changes: Detailed server statistics: More in-depth information.

sections.title: Added Search Function
changes: Powerful search capabilities: Easily find servers with a new, robust search function.
Advanced filters: Narrow down search results using various filters and criteria.

sections.title: Added Updates Page
changes: Stay informed: A new updates page to keep you informed about the latest changes and features.
Detailed changelogs: Access comprehensive patch notes and update history.
